data.eml:eml: Synopsis of the bee genus Thygater Holmberg 1884 (Hymenoptera, Apidae) in the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais, with the description of a new species and a key to all Brazilian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Freitas, Felipe V., Silveira, Fernando A. (2017): Synopsis of the bee genus Thygater Holmberg 1884 (Hymenoptera, Apidae) in the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais, with the description of a new species and a key to all Brazilian species. Zootaxa 4238 (1): 1-29, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.1.1
